localEntry: { "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#", "title": "Partial PayOff Request", "type": "object", "properties": { "sessionContext": { "type": "object", "properties": { "BankCode": { "type": "integer", "description": "Valid FCR bank code (contact FCR support to know the valid bank code with respect to SIT/UAT/PROD)", "maxLength": 5 }, "TransactionBranch": { "type": "integer", "description": "Valid FCR branch code (contact FCR support to know the valid FCR branch code with respect to SIT/UAT/PROD)", "maxLength": 12 }, "UserId": { "type": "string", "description": "Valid FCR user id (contact FCR support to know the valid user id with respect to SIT/UAT/PROD)", "maxLength": 12 } }, "required": ["BankCode", "TransactionBranch", "UserId"] }, "loanAccountId": { "type": "string", "description": "Valid FCR Loan Account", "maxLength": 16 }, "savingsAccountId": { "type": "string", "description": "Valid FCR CASA Account or Valid FCR GL Account", "maxLength": 16 }, "amount": { "type": "number", "description": "Transaction amount (Client should not leave it as blank)", "minimum": 0 }, "ledgerAccountId": { "type": "string", "description": "Ledger Account ID", "maxLength": 16 }, "penaltyMethod": { "type": "integer", "description": "Penalty method (1 -> On Amount, 2 -> On Amount And Term, 3 -> Waive)", "enum": [1, 2, 3] }, "isInterestChargeAppliedTillDate": { "type": "boolean", "description": "Interest charge applied till date (1 -> if applied, 0 -> if not applied)" }, "rescheduleType": { "type": "string", "description": "Reschedule type (I -> Recalculate Installment, T -> Recalculate Term)", "enum": ["I", "T"], "maxLength": 1 }, "flgInstallmentType": { "type": "boolean", "description": "Installment type (0 -> partialPayOffBy CASA, 1 -> partialPayOffBy GL)" }, "transactionType": { "type": "integer", "description": "Transaction type (0 -> normal)", "enum": [0] } }, "required": [ "sessionContext", "loanAccountId", "savingsAccountId", "amount", "ledgerAccountId", "penaltyMethod", "isInterestChargeAppliedTillDate", "rescheduleType", "flgInstallmentType", "transactionType" ]}
